entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
